string-array.name: testQuestionArray
string-array.item: MULTI|What is the first brand of Japanese motorcycle ever sold in the USA?|A) Suzuki|B) Honda|C) Kawasaki|D) None of the above|B) Honda|#|#|#|1
MULTI|Where is Harley Davidson built?|A)San Fransisco, California|B)Portland, Oregon|C)Milwaukee, Wisconsin|D) None of the above|C)Milwaukee, Wisconsin|#|#|#|1
FREE|A ______ mixes air and fuel for the engine|xxx|xxx|xxx|xxx|carburetor|#|#|#|1
FREE|What brand of motorcycle is choice among outlaw motorcycle clubs?|xxx|xxx|xxx|xxx|Harley Davidson|#|#|#|1
MANY|What are brands of motorcycles?|A) Jawa|B) CZ|C) Dell|D) BMW|A) Jawa|B) CZ|#|D) BMW|3
MANY|What are found on a motorcycle?|A) A handlebar|B) A steering wheel|C) A Twist thingy|D) None of the above|A) A handlebar|#|#|#|1
MULTI|What is a fuel petcock|A)A fuel tank|B)A fuel switch|C)A fuel valve|D) A pet chicken|C)A fuel valve|#|#|#|1
FREE|_____ , was the year of the first Honda CB750|1969|xxx|xxx|xxx|1969|#|#|#|1

MANY|What are good practices when riding a motorcycle|A) Pretend that you are invisible|B) Ride to the left of a lane|C) Ride slower than the speed of traffic|D) Never wear a helment|A) Pretend that you are invisible|B) Ride to the left of a lane|#|#|2
